eocms_web_txn_detail.description: The table stores detailed records of electronic payment transactions processed through the web interface. It captures both payment metadata and operational tracking data related to receipt generation, offence linking, and audit trail (e.g., creation and update history).

columns.name: receipt_no
columns.description: Receipt number for the transaction (same as transaction id)

columns.name: type_of_receipt
columns.description: Type code of the receipt

columns.name: remarks
columns.description: Additional remarks or comments

columns.name: transaction_date_and_time
columns.description: Date of the transaction

columns.name: payment_date_and_time
columns.description: Date when URAPG conduct the payment

columns.name: offence_notice_no
columns.description: Reference to offence notice number

columns.name: vehicle_no
columns.description: Vehicle registration number

columns.name: atoms_flag
columns.description: Indicator flag for payable parking fines under court submission. (Yes – Not Payable, No - Payable)

columns.name: payment_mode
columns.description: The method used for payment (JX (Debit), eNETS (credit card), PayNow)

columns.name: payment_amount
columns.description: Amount paid in the transaction

columns.name: total_amount
columns.description: Total amount payable in one transaction receipt number based on notice number

columns.name: sender
columns.description: ID of the sender system or user

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the transaction (S = success/E = error/I = Incomplete

columns.name: error_remarks
columns.description: Error message if any issue during processing

columns.name: is_sync
columns.description: Indicator for sync internet to intranet

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Creation date of the record

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who created the record

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Last updated date

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who last updated the record

columns.name: merchant_ref_no
columns.description: merchant reference number that get from URA PG

eocms_valid_offence_notice.description: The table is a core table in the OCMS system that stores information about valid offence notices. It maintains detailed records of parking offences, including vehicle information, processing stages, payment details, and suspension information.

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: Primary key, notice number

columns.name: vehicle_no
columns.description: Vehicle number

columns.name: an_flag
columns.description: AN flag indicator

columns.name: notice_date_and_time
columns.description: Date and time of notice

columns.name: amount_payable
columns.description: Total payable amount

columns.name: amount_paid
columns.description: Amount paid

columns.name: atoms_flag
columns.description: Flag for ATOMS

columns.name: pp_code
columns.description: PP code

columns.name: pp_name
columns.description: Car Park Name

columns.name: payment_acceptance_allowed
columns.description: Indicates if payment is accepted

columns.name: payment_status
columns.description: Payment status

columns.name: last_processing_stage
columns.description: Last processing stage

columns.name: next_processing_stage
columns.description: Next processing stage

columns.name: vehicle_registration_type
columns.description: Vehicle registration type

columns.name: suspension_type
columns.description: Suspension type

columns.name: crs_reason_of_suspension
columns.description: CRS suspension reason (FP/PRA/null)

columns.name: crs_date_of_suspension
columns.description: CRS suspension date

columns.name: epr_reason_of_suspension
columns.description: EPR suspension reason

columns.name: epr_date_of_suspension
columns.description: EPR suspension date

columns.name: offence_notice_type
columns.description: Type of offence notice (O/E/U)

columns.name: refund_identified_date
columns.description: Date refund indentified

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Creation date of the record

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who created the record

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Last updated date

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who last updated the record

columns.name: eservice_message_code
columns.description: The unique identifier for representing a specific user-level error.

columns.name: is_sync
columns.description: Indicator for sync intranet to intranet

eocms_template_store.description: This table stores template information. It is designed to hold binary template data along with relevant metadata such as type, creation, and update details.

columns.name: template_name
columns.description: The name of the template. Must be unique and descriptive enough to distinguish templates.

columns.name: bin_data
columns.description: The actual binary content of the template

columns.name: remarks
columns.description: Optional remarks or notes associated with the template.

columns.name: template_type
columns.description: Indicates the type or category of the template

columns.name: version
columns.description: Supports template change control and history.

columns.name: template_content
columns.description: Human-readable description of what the template is for (and optionally what changed)

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Marks which version is currently “live” and should be used by the system.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Creation date of the record

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who created the record

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Last updated date

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who last updated the record

eocms_user_message.description: This table stores standardized error definitions for user-related operations.

columns.name: eservice_message_code
columns.description: The unique identifier for representing a specific user-level error.

columns.name: eservice_message
columns.description: A clear message for user about the error happen

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Creation date of the record

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who created the record

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Last updated date

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who last updated the record

eocms_payment_matrix.description: This table stores payment matrix rules that determine the payment processing flow based on various criteria.

columns.name: rule_code
columns.description: Unique code identifying the payment rule.

columns.name: notice_type
columns.description: Type of notice associated with the payment (e.g., fine, tax, renewal).

columns.name: last_processing_stage
columns.description: The last processing stage before payment is made.

columns.name: next_processing_stage
columns.description: The next processing stage after payment is completed.

columns.name: vehicle_registration_type
columns.description: Type of vehicle registration (e.g., new, renewal, transfer).

columns.name: show
columns.description: Flag to determine if the payment option should be displayed.

columns.name: error_code
columns.description: Error code returned if payment processing fails.

columns.name: payment_acceptance_flag
columns.description: Indicates whether the payment is acceptable.

columns.name: owner_driver_indicator
columns.description: Specifies if the payment applies to the owner, driver, or both (OWNER, DRIVER, BOTH).

columns.name: payable
columns.description: Indicates if the payment is payable.

columns.name: send_letter
columns.description: Flag to trigger a notification letter after payment.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Creation date of the record

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who created the record

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Last updated date

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who last updated the record

eocms_web_txn_audit.description: This table stores audit trail of all web transactions exchanged between OCMS and external systems (e.g., REPCCS), including payload details and status.

columns.name: web_txn_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the web transaction.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Record creation date.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or system that created the record.

columns.name: msg_error
columns.description: Error message received (if any).

columns.name: record_counter
columns.description: Number of records sent in the transaction.

columns.name: send_date
columns.description: Date when the transaction was sent.

columns.name: send_time
columns.description: Time when the transaction was sent.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Identifier of the sending system (e.g., REPCCS).

columns.name: status_num
columns.description: Status indicator for the transaction.

columns.name: target_receiver
columns.description: Target system receiving the transaction.

columns.name: service_code
columns.description: Type of dataset exchange (e.g. NOPO)

columns.name: txn_detail
columns.description: Full transaction payload (usually JSON format).

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Date the record was last updated.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or system who updated the record.

eocms_driver_notice.description: This table stores information about driver notices, including details related to notice processing, the driver’s information, and any claims or reminders.

columns.name: date_of_processing
columns.description: The date when the notice was processed.

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: The notice number associated with the driver notice.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: The date when the driver notice record was created.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: The ID of the user who created the driver notice.

columns.name: date_of_dn
columns.description: The date of the driver notice (DN).

columns.name: date_of_return
columns.description: The date when the notice was returned, if applicable.

columns.name: driver_bldg
columns.description: The building name of the driver's address.

columns.name: driver_blk_hse_no
columns.description: The block or house number of the driver's address.

columns.name: driver_floor
columns.description: The floor number of the driver's address.

columns.name: driver_id_type
columns.description: The ID type used to identify the driver (e.g., NRIC, passport).

columns.name: driver_name
columns.description: The name of the driver.

columns.name: driver_nric_no
columns.description: The driver's NRIC or ID number.

columns.name: driver_postal_code
columns.description: The postal code of the driver's address.

columns.name: driver_street
columns.description: The street name of the driver's address.

columns.name: driver_unit
columns.description: The unit number of the driver's address.

columns.name: postal_regn_no
columns.description: Postal registration number, if applicable.

columns.name: processing_stage
columns.description: The current stage of processing for the driver notice.

columns.name: reason_for_unclaim
columns.description: Reason provided for unclaimed notices, if applicable.

columns.name: reminder_flag
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a reminder has been sent.

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: The date when the driver notice was last updated.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: The ID of the user who last updated the driver notice.

eocms_request_driver_particulars.description: Contains information about requests for driver particulars and their processing stages.

columns.name: date_of_processing
columns.description: Date when the driver particulars request was processed.

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: Notice number associated with the request.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Date when the request was created.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: User ID of the creator of the request.

columns.name: date_of_rdp
columns.description: Date when the request for driver particulars was submitted.

columns.name: date_of_return
columns.description: Date when the request was returned, if applicable.

columns.name: owner_bldg
columns.description: Owner’s building information.

columns.name: owner_blk_hse_no
columns.description: Owner’s block or house number.

columns.name: owner_floor
columns.description: Owner’s floor number.

columns.name: owner_id_type
columns.description: Type of ID for the owner.

columns.name: owner_name
columns.description: Name of the owner.

columns.name: owner_nric_no
columns.description: NRIC number of the owner.

columns.name: owner_postal_code
columns.description: Postal code for the owner’s address.

columns.name: owner_street
columns.description: Street address of the owner.

columns.name: owner_unit
columns.description: Unit number for the owner’s address.

columns.name: postal_regn_no
columns.description: Postal registration number.

columns.name: processing_stage
columns.description: Current processing stage of the request.

columns.name: reminder_flag
columns.description: Flag indicating if a reminder has been issued.

columns.name: unclaimed_reason
columns.description: Reason for unclaimed request.

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Date when the request was last updated.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: User ID of the person who last updated the request.

sequence table.description: for generate txn ref number in eocms_web_txn_detail

eocms_captcha.description: This table stores the generated CAPTCHA records used for user validation. It keeps the CAPTCHA text, expiry rules, and metadata for creation and update tracking.

columns.name: captcha_text
columns.description: CAPTCHA text generated by the system (6-character alphanumeric).

columns.name: expires_at
columns.description: Expiry timestamp (10 minutes from creation). Determines CAPTCHA validity.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Record creation timestamp.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: Identifier of the user or system process that created the record.

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Record last updated timestamp.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: Identifier of the user or system process that last updated the record.
